title: everlyn to mutch broken.
body:
Wanted to talk about the evelyn champion, in my opinion, he finds himself broken too much with a certain build of guardian angel, gunblade, and dragon's claw.
Your passive makes any champion with 65% less health take one shot practice, and with gunblade that will make him full life, which gives him the possibility of ever again, again, again, even manage to kill the entire enemy team on their own.

alone can kill a team of 10. .-.

replies.body: she cant kill a whole team by herself lol. She needs other units to soak damage and distract for her so she can deal her damage. She dies almost immediately if someone gets their hands on her. She's not nearly as broken as a Draven with items.

> [{quoted}](name=BongMage420,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=wffkeGTf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-06T00:43:13.165+0000)
>
> she cant kill a whole team by herself lol. She needs other units to soak damage and distract for her so she can deal her damage. She dies almost immediately if someone gets their hands on her. She's not nearly as broken as a Draven with items.

Against the right team she almost can. It doesn't really matter who your other units are as long as you have a few to take agro at the start. I had a game recently where I got a tier 3 eve who was doing like 17k damage a round while the next highest on my team most of the time was like 1k damage haha
if they don't start building magic resist items when they see an item stacked 3 star eve, then that's just Darwinism at that point

> [{quoted}](name=BongMage420,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=wffkeGTf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-06T08:47:50.866+0000)
>
> if they don't start building magic resist items when they see an item stacked 3 star eve, then that's just Darwinism at that point

How do you build magic resist, when items and champions are up to RNG? In that case your only hope is that you can get items from the carousel and that might be too late or you need to get dragons, which again are up to RNG. Also executing 65% champs is just broken.

> [{quoted}](name=BongMage420,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=wffkeGTf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-06T08:47:50.866+0000)
>
> if they don't start building magic resist items when they see an item stacked 3 star eve, then that's just Darwinism at that point

By the time I had her 3 starred, there's not much you can do to get mr besides the carosel, and if you don't get lucky there, you're out of luck. Or I guess if you get a dragons claw from the infernal drake.

But yeah, the one last guy other than me had a stacked chogath with a dragon's claw and he ended up winning, but it was pretty back and forth.
